title: Siemens and Microsoft launch Industrial Copilot for manufacturing - Tech Monitor
summary: Siemens and Microsoft are collaborating to introduce Siemens Industrial Copilot, an AI-powered assistant for improving human-machine collaboration in factories. The Copilot aims to accelerate code development, increase productivity and efficiency, and empower professionals in various industries.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334510 - Electromedical and Electrotherapeutic Apparatus Manufacturing, 541330 - Engineering Services, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services, 511210 - Software Publishers
